name: Drabidiboo
description:
Drabidiboo is a turn-based strategy game of prediction with a strong meta component, containing a large set of Pets to collect and use to build up your team.

Two players compete to gather the most gems on a 10x10 board. The moves and actions are all declared simultaneously so outsmarting the opponent is key; attack, defend or use the board layout to your advantage.

== PLEASE NOTE ==

Before downloading the game please keep in mind that this is an Early Access title!

Are you ok with...
  • limited content that gets expanded over time?
  • frequent updates?
  • actively giving constructive feedback to shape the game?
  • supporting an indie-game studio by participating in early access?

If you can honestly say yes to all of the above, awesome!
Please join our active & friendly community!

If you are unsure, just add Drabidiboo to your wishlist and join our Discord to make a well-informed decision!

:)
